doc.field: RTE CORP RTE> BUYS EMHART CORP UNIT

RTE Corp said it completed the purchase of Emhart Corp's United States aluminum electrolytic capacitor business for an undisclosed sum. The company said the capacitor business is part of Emhart's electrical and electronic group marketed under the Mallory brand name. The company said the product lines it acquired had sales of 25 mln dlrs last year. Reuter
